title: Popular writer Tarak Mehta passes away at 87
text:
Popular writer Tarak Mehta passes away at 87 RIP Tarak Mehta. comments 
Writer, columnist and known for his humour, Tarak Mehta passed away in Ahmedabad. The writer gained a huge popularity for his column, Duniya Ne Undha Chasma, which was in Gujarati. His work had been translated and adapted in several Gujarati plays and also inspired the makers of popular show, Tarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashma. The SAB TV show began in 2008 and has been one of the Top 10 shows ever since. The show is extremely popular and one of the most loved shows in the country. His death did come across as a huge shock for many and we Twitter has been mourning his death ever since the news broke out. 
The writer was married twice, survived by his daughter from his first marriage and his second wife. His daughter, Ishaani, lives in the US and has two kids of her own. He was also awarded the Padma Shri in 2015 which is one of the fourth highest civilian awards in our country. This will be a huge setback and difficult time even for the cast of Tarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashma since their show was inspired by his columns. Take a look at what people are tweeting to mourn his death.
